actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the annual imposition and payment of the gift tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require determination of gift tax liability on a calendar year, rather than quarterly, basis. Applies the return requirement on a calendar year, rather than quarterly, basis.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the annual imposition and payment of the gift tax.
